Actions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInst	set kmTmpPath to getvariable "local_TmpPath" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Pathstell application "System Events"	set thePP_Path to POSIX path of disk item kmPathend tellset theA_Path to alias POSIX file thePP_Pathset theA_TmpPath to alias POSIX file kmTmpPathtell application "Finder"	set newAlias to make new alias to theA_Path at theA_TmpPathend tellreturn kmTmpPath & name of newAlias
